acceptinboundconnection.name: AcceptInboundConnection
acceptinboundconnection.description: Grants permission to the destination domain owner to accept an inbound cross-cluster search connection request

acceptinboundcrossclustersearchconnectio.name: AcceptInboundCrossClusterSearchConnection
acceptinboundcrossclustersearchconnectio.description: Grants permission to the destination domain owner to accept an inbound cross-cluster search connection request. This permission is deprecated. Use AcceptInboundConnection instead

adddatasource.name: AddDataSource
adddatasource.description: Grants permission to add the data source for the OpenSearch Service domain

addtags.name: AddTags
addtags.description: Grants permission to attach resource tags to an OpenSearch Service domain

associatepackage.name: AssociatePackage
associatepackage.description: Grants permission to associate a package with an OpenSearch Service domain

authorizevpcendpointaccess.name: AuthorizeVpcEndpointAccess
authorizevpcendpointaccess.description: Grants permission to provide access to an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain through the use of an interface VPC endpoint

canceldomainconfigchange.name: CancelDomainConfigChange
canceldomainconfigchange.description: Grants permission to cancel a change on an OpenSearch Service domain

cancelelasticsearchservicesoftwareupdate.name: CancelElasticsearchServiceSoftwareUpdate
cancelelasticsearchservicesoftwareupdate.description: Grants permission to cancel a service software update of a domain. This permission is deprecated. Use CancelServiceSoftwareUpdate instead

cancelservicesoftwareupdate.name: CancelServiceSoftwareUpdate
cancelservicesoftwareupdate.description: Grants permission to cancel a service software update of a domain

createdomain.name: CreateDomain
createdomain.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain

createelasticsearchdomain.name: CreateElasticsearchDomain
createelasticsearchdomain.description: Grants permission to create an OpenSearch Service domain. This permission is deprecated. Use CreateDomain instead

createelasticsearchservicerole.name: CreateElasticsearchServiceRole
createelasticsearchservicerole.description: Grants permission to create the service-linked role required for OpenSearch Service domains that use VPC access. This permission is deprecated. OpenSearch Service creates the service-linked role for you

createoutboundconnection.name: CreateOutboundConnection
createoutboundconnection.description: Grants permission to create a new cross-cluster search connection from a source domain to a destination domain

createoutboundcrossclustersearchconnecti.name: CreateOutboundCrossClusterSearchConnection
createoutboundcrossclustersearchconnecti.description: Grants permission to create a new cross-cluster search connection from a source domain to a destination domain. This permission is deprecated. Use CreateOutboundConnection instead

createpackage.name: CreatePackage
createpackage.description: Grants permission to add a package for use with OpenSearch Service domains

createservicerole.name: CreateServiceRole
createservicerole.description: Grants permission to create the service-linked role required for Amazon OpenSearch Service domains that use VPC access

createvpcendpoint.name: CreateVpcEndpoint
createvpcendpoint.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon OpenSearch Service-managed VPC endpoint

deletedatasource.name: DeleteDataSource
deletedatasource.description: Grants permission to delete the data source for the OpenSearch Service domain

deletedomain.name: DeleteDomain
deletedomain.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain and all of its data

deleteelasticsearchdomain.name: DeleteElasticsearchDomain
deleteelasticsearchdomain.description: Grants permission to delete an OpenSearch Service domain and all of its data. This permission is deprecated. Use DeleteDomain instead

deleteelasticsearchservicerole.name: DeleteElasticsearchServiceRole
deleteelasticsearchservicerole.description: Grants permission to delete the service-linked role required for OpenSearch Service domains that use VPC access. This permission is deprecated. Use the IAM API to delete service-linked roles

deleteinboundconnection.name: DeleteInboundConnection
deleteinboundconnection.description: Grants permission to the destination domain owner to delete an existing inbound cross-cluster search connection

deleteinboundcrossclustersearchconnectio.name: DeleteInboundCrossClusterSearchConnection
deleteinboundcrossclustersearchconnectio.description: Grants permission to the destination domain owner to delete an existing inbound cross-cluster search connection. This permission is deprecated. Use DeleteInboundConnection instead

deleteoutboundconnection.name: DeleteOutboundConnection
deleteoutboundconnection.description: Grants permission to the source domain owner to delete an existing outbound cross-cluster search connection

deleteoutboundcrossclustersearchconnecti.name: DeleteOutboundCrossClusterSearchConnection
deleteoutboundcrossclustersearchconnecti.description: Grants permission to the source domain owner to delete an existing outbound cross-cluster search connection. This permission is deprecated. Use DeleteOutboundConnection instead

deletepackage.name: DeletePackage
deletepackage.description: Grants permission to delete a package from OpenSearch Service. The package cannot be associated with any domains

deletevpcendpoint.name: DeleteVpcEndpoint
deletevpcendpoint.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon OpenSearch Service-managed interface VPC endpoint

describedomain.name: DescribeDomain
describedomain.description: Grants permission to view a description of the domain configuration for the specified OpenSearch Service domain, including the domain ID, service endpoint, and ARN

describedomainautotunes.name: DescribeDomainAutoTunes
describedomainautotunes.description: Grants permission to view the Auto-Tune configuration of the domain for the specified OpenSearch Service domain, including the Auto-Tune state and maintenance schedules

describedomainchangeprogress.name: DescribeDomainChangeProgress
describedomainchangeprogress.description: Grants permission to view detail stage progress of an OpenSearch Service domain

describedomainconfig.name: DescribeDomainConfig
describedomainconfig.description: Grants permission to view a description of the configuration options and status of an OpenSearch Service domain

describedomainhealth.name: DescribeDomainHealth
describedomainhealth.description: Grants permission to view information about domain and node health, the standby Availability Zone, number of nodes per Availability Zone, and shard count per node

describedomainnodes.name: DescribeDomainNodes
describedomainnodes.description: Grants permission to view information about nodes configured for the domain and their configurations- the node id, type of node, status of node, Availability Zone, instance type and storage

describedomains.name: DescribeDomains
describedomains.description: Grants permission to view a description of the domain configuration for up to five specified OpenSearch Service domains

describedryrunprogress.name: DescribeDryRunProgress
describedryrunprogress.description: Grants permission to describe the status of a pre-update validation check on an OpenSearch Service domain

describeelasticsearchdomain.name: DescribeElasticsearchDomain
describeelasticsearchdomain.description: Grants permission to view a description of the domain configuration for the specified OpenSearch Service domain, including the domain ID, service endpoint, and ARN. This permission is deprecated. Use DescribeDomain instead

describeelasticsearchdomainconfig.name: DescribeElasticsearchDomainConfig
describeelasticsearchdomainconfig.description: Grants permission to view a description of the configuration and status of an OpenSearch Service domain. This permission is deprecated. Use DescribeDomainConfig instead

describeelasticsearchdomains.name: DescribeElasticsearchDomains
describeelasticsearchdomains.description: Grants permission to view a description of the domain configuration for up to five specified Amazon OpenSearch domains. This permission is deprecated. Use DescribeDomains instead

describeelasticsearchinstancetypelimits.name: DescribeElasticsearchInstanceTypeLimits
describeelasticsearchinstancetypelimits.description: Grants permission to view the instance count, storage, and master node limits for a given OpenSearch version and instance type. This permission is deprecated. Use DescribeInstanceTypeLimits instead

describeinboundconnections.name: DescribeInboundConnections
describeinboundconnections.description: Grants permission to list all the inbound cross-cluster search connections for a destination domain

describeinboundcrossclustersearchconnect.name: DescribeInboundCrossClusterSearchConnections
describeinboundcrossclustersearchconnect.description: Grants permission to list all the inbound cross-cluster search connections for a destination domain. This permission is deprecated. Use DescribeInboundConnections instead

describeinstancetypelimits.name: DescribeInstanceTypeLimits
describeinstancetypelimits.description: Grants permission to view the instance count, storage, and master node limits for a given engine version and instance type

describeoutboundconnections.name: DescribeOutboundConnections
describeoutboundconnections.description: Grants permission to list all the outbound cross-cluster search connections for a source domain

describeoutboundcrossclustersearchconnec.name: DescribeOutboundCrossClusterSearchConnections
describeoutboundcrossclustersearchconnec.description: Grants permission to list all the outbound cross-cluster search connections for a source domain. This permission is deprecated. Use DescribeOutboundConnections instead

describepackages.name: DescribePackages
describepackages.description: Grants permission to describe all packages available to OpenSearch Service domains

describereservedelasticsearchinstanceoff.name: DescribeReservedElasticsearchInstanceOfferings
describereservedelasticsearchinstanceoff.description: Grants permission to fetch Reserved Instance offerings for Amazon OpenSearch Service. This permission is deprecated. Use DescribeReservedInstanceOfferings instead

describereservedelasticsearchinstances.name: DescribeReservedElasticsearchInstances
describereservedelasticsearchinstances.description: Grants permission to fetch OpenSearch Service Reserved Instances that have already been purchased. This permission is deprecated. Use DescribeReservedInstances instead

describereservedinstanceofferings.name: DescribeReservedInstanceOfferings
describereservedinstanceofferings.description: Grants permission to fetch Reserved Instance offerings for OpenSearch Service

describereservedinstances.name: DescribeReservedInstances
describereservedinstances.description: Grants permission to fetch OpenSearch Service Reserved Instances that have already been purchased

describevpcendpoints.name: DescribeVpcEndpoints
describevpcendpoints.description: Grants permission to describe one or more Amazon OpenSearch Service-managed VPC endpoints

dissociatepackage.name: DissociatePackage
dissociatepackage.description: Grants permission to disassociate a package from the specified OpenSearch Service domain

escrossclusterget.name: ESCrossClusterGet
escrossclusterget.description: Grants permission to send cross-cluster requests to a destination domain

eshttpdelete.name: ESHttpDelete
eshttpdelete.description: Grants permission to send HTTP DELETE requests to the OpenSearch APIs

eshttpget.name: ESHttpGet
eshttpget.description: Grants permission to send HTTP GET requests to the OpenSearch APIs

eshttphead.name: ESHttpHead
eshttphead.description: Grants permission to send HTTP HEAD requests to the OpenSearch APIs

eshttppatch.name: ESHttpPatch
eshttppatch.description: Grants permission to send HTTP PATCH requests to the OpenSearch APIs

eshttppost.name: ESHttpPost
eshttppost.description: Grants permission to send HTTP POST requests to the OpenSearch APIs

eshttpput.name: ESHttpPut
eshttpput.description: Grants permission to send HTTP PUT requests to the OpenSearch APIs

getcompatibleelasticsearchversions.name: GetCompatibleElasticsearchVersions
getcompatibleelasticsearchversions.description: Grants permission to fetch a list of compatible OpenSearch and Elasticsearch versions to which an OpenSearch Service domain can be upgraded. This permission is deprecated. Use GetCompatibleVersions instead

getcompatibleversions.name: GetCompatibleVersions
getcompatibleversions.description: Grants permission to fetch list of compatible engine versions to which an OpenSearch Service domain can be upgraded

getdatasource.name: GetDataSource
getdatasource.description: Grants permission to get the data source for the OpenSearch Service domain

getdomainmaintenancestatus.name: GetDomainMaintenanceStatus
getdomainmaintenancestatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve the status of maintenance action for the node

getpackageversionhistory.name: GetPackageVersionHistory
getpackageversionhistory.description: Grants permission to fetch the version history for a package

getupgradehistory.name: GetUpgradeHistory
getupgradehistory.description: Grants permission to fetch the upgrade history of a given OpenSearch Service domain

getupgradestatus.name: GetUpgradeStatus
getupgradestatus.description: Grants permission to fetch the upgrade status of a given OpenSearch Service domain

listdatasources.name: ListDataSources
listdatasources.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of data source for the OpenSearch Service domain

listdomainmaintenances.name: ListDomainMaintenances
listdomainmaintenances.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of maintenance actions for the OpenSearch Service domain

listdomainnames.name: ListDomainNames
listdomainnames.description: Grants permission to display the names of all OpenSearch Service domains that the current user owns

listdomainsforpackage.name: ListDomainsForPackage
listdomainsforpackage.description: Grants permission to list all OpenSearch Service domains that a package is associated with

listelasticsearchinstancetypedetails.name: ListElasticsearchInstanceTypeDetails
listelasticsearchinstancetypedetails.description: Grants permission to list all instance types and available features for a given OpenSearch version. This permission is deprecated. Use ListInstanceTypeDetails instead

listelasticsearchinstancetypes.name: ListElasticsearchInstanceTypes
listelasticsearchinstancetypes.description: Grants permission to list all EC2 instance types that are supported for a given OpenSearch version

listelasticsearchversions.name: ListElasticsearchVersions
listelasticsearchversions.description: Grants permission to list all supported OpenSearch versions on Amazon OpenSearch Service. This permission is deprecated. Use ListVersions instead

listinstancetypedetails.name: ListInstanceTypeDetails
listinstancetypedetails.description: Grants permission to list all instance types and available features for a given OpenSearch or Elasticsearch version

listpackagesfordomain.name: ListPackagesForDomain
listpackagesfordomain.description: Grants permission to list all packages associated with the OpenSearch Service domain

listscheduledactions.name: ListScheduledActions
listscheduledactions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of configuration changes that are scheduled for a OpenSearch Service domain

listtags.name: ListTags
listtags.description: Grants permission to display all resource tags for an OpenSearch Service domain

listversions.name: ListVersions
listversions.description: Grants permission to list all supported OpenSearch and Elasticsearch versions in Amazon OpenSearch Service

listvpcendpointaccess.name: ListVpcEndpointAccess
listvpcendpointaccess.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about each AWS principal that is allowed to access a given Amazon OpenSearch Service domain through the use of an interface VPC endpoint

listvpcendpoints.name: ListVpcEndpoints
listvpcendpoints.description: Grants permission to retrieve all Amazon OpenSearch Service-managed VPC endpoints in the current AWS account and Region

listvpcendpointsfordomain.name: ListVpcEndpointsForDomain
listvpcendpointsfordomain.description: Grants permission to retrieve all Amazon OpenSearch Service-managed VPC endpoints associated with a particular domain

purchasereservedelasticsearchinstanceoff.name: PurchaseReservedElasticsearchInstanceOffering
purchasereservedelasticsearchinstanceoff.description: Grants permission to purchase OpenSearch Service Reserved Instances. This permission is deprecated. Use PurchaseReservedInstanceOffering instead

purchasereservedinstanceoffering.name: PurchaseReservedInstanceOffering
purchasereservedinstanceoffering.description: Grants permission to purchase OpenSearch reserved instances

rejectinboundconnection.name: RejectInboundConnection
rejectinboundconnection.description: Grants permission to the destination domain owner to reject an inbound cross-cluster search connection request

rejectinboundcrossclustersearchconnectio.name: RejectInboundCrossClusterSearchConnection
rejectinboundcrossclustersearchconnectio.description: Grants permission to the destination domain owner to reject an inbound cross-cluster search connection request. This permission is deprecated. Use RejectInboundConnection instead

removetags.name: RemoveTags
removetags.description: Grants permission to remove resource tags from an OpenSearch Service domain

revokevpcendpointaccess.name: RevokeVpcEndpointAccess
revokevpcendpointaccess.description: Grants permission to revoke access to an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain that was provided through an interface VPC endpoint

startdomainmaintenance.name: StartDomainMaintenance
startdomainmaintenance.description: Grants permission to initiate the maintenance on the node

startelasticsearchservicesoftwareupdate.name: StartElasticsearchServiceSoftwareUpdate
startelasticsearchservicesoftwareupdate.description: Grants permission to start a service software update of a domain. This permission is deprecated. Use StartServiceSoftwareUpdate instead

startservicesoftwareupdate.name: StartServiceSoftwareUpdate
startservicesoftwareupdate.description: Grants permission to start a service software update of a domain

updatedatasource.name: UpdateDataSource
updatedatasource.description: Grants permission to update the data source for the OpenSearch Service domain

updatedomainconfig.name: UpdateDomainConfig
updatedomainconfig.description: Grants permission to modify the configuration of an OpenSearch Service domain, such as the instance type or number of instances

updateelasticsearchdomainconfig.name: UpdateElasticsearchDomainConfig
updateelasticsearchdomainconfig.description: Grants permission to modify the configuration of an OpenSearch Service domain, such as the instance type or number of instances. This permission is deprecated. Use UpdateDomainConfig instead

updatepackage.name: UpdatePackage
updatepackage.description: Grants permission to update a package for use with OpenSearch Service domains

updatescheduledaction.name: UpdateScheduledAction
updatescheduledaction.description: Grants permission to reschedule a planned OpenSearch Service domain configuration change for a later time

updatevpcendpoint.name: UpdateVpcEndpoint
updatevpcendpoint.description: Grants permission to modify an Amazon OpenSearch Service-managed interface VPC endpoint

upgradedomain.name: UpgradeDomain
upgradedomain.description: Grants permission to initiate upgrade of an OpenSearch Service domain to a given version

upgradeelasticsearchdomain.name: UpgradeElasticsearchDomain
upgradeelasticsearchdomain.description: Grants permission to initiate upgrade of an OpenSearch Service domain to a specified version. This permission is deprecated. Use UpgradeDomain instead
